page.title: 15HOTHFIELD CHURCH (1)
page.content:
The area within the square is mainly farmland with a small area of woodland consisting of decidious trees.
{Hothfield Church,}which is some distance from the village, dates from the{13th century.}Adjacent to the church is{Hothfield Manor}which is now a private residential home for the elderly, also dates from the 13th century, the original house became unsafe and was largely rebuilt during WW II.
Another feature of the square is a small Wood turning factory, a family business specialising in furniture components. Some of the machinery is over 100 years old and still in good working order.
